pullRequest.title: Streamline new library command
pullRequest.bodyText:
fixes #6470
closes #6539
This PR implements the changes, which were decided in the devcall in early june about the PR (#6539 (comment))
It merges the new library command in the toolbar and the file menu to always create a new library in the current default library mode and changes the label in the preferences.



 Change in CHANGELOG.md described (if applicable)
 Tests created for changes (if applicable)
 Manually tested changed features in running JabRef (always required)
 Screenshots added in PR description (for UI changes)
 Checked documentation: Is the information available and up to date? If not created an issue at https://github.com/JabRef/user-documentation/issues or, even better, submitted a pull request to the documentation repository.

nodes.bodyText:
Is this constructor used somewhere? (I couldn't find it in the changelog, but maybe I'm missing something).
If not then, the mode and shouldUseDefaultMode variables can be deleted as well.
